entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:13 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 09:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: ENE 30 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
